name: Duration;Zero
description:
Survive and kill your enemies by flinging your sword around. When you feel overwhelmed, use your time stop ability to plan and use spells to unleash all at once when you resume time again. Spells cost a different amount of time energy, which you can get back by killing enemies with your sword.

Move around with Z,Q,S,D or the arrow keys

Fling your sword with the mouse

Pause time with Right Click

Choose a spell by Left Clicking it (an use it on the ground by Left Clicking where you want), then Right Click to release all the spells at once

Dash with the Spacebar

Spells : 
- Stomp : Very costly, places a teleport point with an AOE attack where you click
- Warp : Very Low cost, teleports you where you click
- Bomb : Normal cost, places an AOE attack where you stand

Remember that you can choose to throw multiple spells in one time stop
